meanings.definition: A person who habitually indulges in daydreaming.
meanings.sent1: Many daydreamers enjoy imagining exciting adventures in their minds.
meanings.sent2: The group of daydreamers sat under the tree, lost in their own thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The daydreamers in class often miss important instructions while lost in their fantasies.
meanings.sent4: Her head was always in the clouds, like a flock of daydreamers drifting away.
meanings.sent5: The daydreamers painted vivid pictures in their minds, escaping reality for a while.
